page.title: 09FOUNDRY/SCRAPYARD,SOUTH FEN
page.content: The one{major source of employment} in this area is the separate foundry/ scrapyard and haulage businesses owned and managed by the brothers{Laud}of {South Fen}near Tongue End, Bourne who live and work on adjoining properties. Very often the total number of workers is in excess of seventy, more than the total population of the area. The{foundry}is sited to the rear of a fairly large scrapyard.Lorries bring the scrap metals/objects to the yard where it is separated and the iron sent to the foundry for smelting. The molten metal is then made into manhole and drain covers for resale all over the country.The unused scrap is taken by lorry to Dover or Felixstowe for shipment to many European countries. Next door, the{haulage business}is run as a separate company to the owner's farm.
